    Reference

    All functions

    arnaq()

    Create an ARNAQ Report

    arnaq.create.report()

    Creates an ARNAQ report from the premade plots.

    arnaq.prepare()

    Create ARNAQ support files

    arnaq_clear()

    Removes ARNAQ objects

    export_all_svg()

    Exports all the plots created by arnaq in svg format.

    export_svg()

    Exports a single plot as svg.

    make_outlier_mask()

    Create a mask based on sample names

    plot_ERCC_errors()

    Creates a plot of errors in fold-change estimates for ERCC spike-ins

    plot_ERCC_fc_scatter()

    Creates a scatterplot of ERCC spike-in fold-change ratios against the true values

    plot_ERCC_observed_scatter()

    Creates a plot of observed and expected ERCC spike-in concentrations

    plot_PCA_group()

    Creates a PCA plot (coloured by group).

    plot_PCA_group_set()

    Creates a list of PCA plots (coloured by group membership) up to a certain depth.

    plot_PCA_ids()

    Creates a PCA plot (by sample name).

    plot_PCA_ids_set()

    Creates a list of PCA plots (by sample name) up to a certain depth.

    plot_all.ERCC.pairs()

    Creates plots showing ERCC spike-in comparisons

    plot_all_PCA_groups()

    Creates a list of lists of PCA plots (coloured by group membership, for provided groups) up to a certain depth.

    plot_all_clustering()

    Create a list of four plots to show similarity between samples.

    plot_all_metrics_violin()

    Creates two violin plots of metrics, based on scale.

    plot_all_scatter_pairs()

    Creates a list of scatter plot of reads for two samples.

    plot_complexity_curves()

    Create a plot showing complexity

    plot_counts_barplot()

    Create read count barplots

    plot_detected_curves()

    Create a plot showing detected genes

    plot_meanSdPlot()

    Creates a standard meanSdPlot

    plot_metrics_violin()

    Creates a violin plot of metrics.

    plot_pie_biotype()

    Create a pie chart showing the distribution of biotypes across observed transcripts.

    plot_reads_scatter()

    Creates a scatter plot of reads for two samples.
